content: and knit final 2 underarm sts to complete round pm to mark beginning of round 2nd round k1 k2tog k2tog k until 5 sts remain k2tog k2tog k1 49 sts k all following sleeve rounds with the exception of rounds with decreases and the curry diamond section work 4 more rnds in white the total number of white row/rnds should now be the same on the sleeve and the body this will also apply to all other coloured sections of the sleeve and body begin working in blue work 2 rnds *2nd round has decreases as follows decrease round k2tog k until 2 sts remain ssk 47 sts begin working in azur blue work 6 rnds begin working in curry work 2 rnds then begin diamond pattern as described below diamond pattern is an 8 round pattern repeated 3 times as in the body of the cardigan rounds with decreases are in bold ©vraja leader - @tiemeinknits diamonds for baby cardigan page 7 of 9 diamond pattern 1st set of 8 rounds round 1 *k7 p1 repeat from *until 7 sts remain k7 round 2 p1 *k5 p1 k1 p1 repeat from * until 6 sts remain k5 p1 round 3 k1 *p1 k3 repeat from * until 2 sts remain p1 k1 round 4 k2tog *p1 k1 p1 k5 repeat from * until 5 sts remain p1 k1 p1 ssk 45 sts round 5 k2 *p1 k7 repeat from * until 3 sts remain p1 k2 round 6 k1 *p1 k1 p1 k5 repeat from * until 4 sts remain p1 k1 p1 k1 round 7 *p1 k3 repeat from * until 1 st remain p1 round 8 *k5 p1 k1 p1 repeat from * until 5 sts remain k5 2nd set of 8 rounds round 1 k6 *p1 k7 repeat from * until 7 sts remain p1 k6 round 2 *k5 p1 k1 p1 repeat from * until 5 sts remain k5 round 3 and 7 *p1 k3 repeat from * until 1 st remains p1 round 4 and 6 k1 *p1 k1 p1 k5 repeat from * until 4 sts remain p1 k1 p1 k1 round 5 k2 *p1 k7 repeat from * until 3 sts remain p1 k2 round 8 k2tog k3 *p1 k1 p1 k5 repeat from * until 8 sts remain p1 k1 p1 k3 ssk 43 sts 3rd set of 8 rounds round 1 k5 *p1 k7 repeat from * until 6 sts remain p1 k5 round 2 and 8 k4 *p1 k1 p1 k5 repeat from * until 7 sts remain p1 k1 p1 k4 round 3 and 7 *k3 p1 repeat from * until 3 sts remain k3 round 4 and 6 *p1 k1 p1 k5 repeat from * until 3 sts remain p1 k1 p1 round 5 k1 *p1 k7 repeat from * until 2 sts remain p1 k1 work round 1 from this 3rd set a final time to finish the diamond pattern work 1 round in curry as
